title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 366.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part governs the Child Assistance Program (CAP). CAP
is a district optional component of the Family Assistance (FA) program. CAP is
designed to motivate FA recipients to take steps towards financial
self-sufficiency. A district may participate in CAP with the approval of the

Office of Temporary and Disability Assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
366.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
